document.full_text: south african charl schwartzel birdied the last four holes to clinch his first major title with a two-stroke victory at the masters on sunday, ending a stunning afternoon of brilliant shot-making.
document.title: schwartzel wins masters after mcilroy nightmare
lines_and_colors: south african charl schwartzel birdied the last four holes to clinch his first major title with a two-stroke victory at the masters on sunday, ending a stunning afternoon of brilliant shot-making.
